mapper.select: select tpfr.id,tpfr.type,tpfr.serial_number,tpfr.name,tpfr.period,tpfr.charge_mode,tpfr.monetary_unit,tpfr.penal_sum,tpfr.penal_days,tpfr.status,tpfr.create_by,tpfr.update_by,tau.real_name as updateByName,tpfr.update_time from t_property_fee_rule tpfr left join t_admin_user tau on tpfr.update_by=tau.uid where tpfr.id=#{communityId}
